First time poster here.

I just purchased and installed KSP on OS X Yosemite. I am trying to bind/configure my t.flight hotas 4 but am having trouble with KSP recognizing the throttle and yaw (z-axis). I have been pursuing the internet for ~1.5 days, and have found no solution. I have not found anything specifically relating to my problem with my type of peripheral. 

I have done preliminary a preliminary assessment of the joystick and throttle and have discovered that at the very least my Mac recognizes all axises and buttons with their full range of motion (this was done using Joystick and Gamepad tester I downloaded).

Has anyone successfully configured a t.flight hotas 4 with KSP, or is this a lost cause? 

Thanks for your help.

@leakyaquitard

Side note: I'm on macOS Sierra and KSP runs fine just like everything else imo. 

(Can't tell from your post so I'll ask...) Are you adjusting/editing/assigning the joystick from within the game? At the menu go to settings/Input it should be there.

Welcome to The Forum
